title: If one Region took control of the rest of the Runeterra, which Region would you prefer to do so?
body:
Personally i'd say Ionia because most Regions that come to mind would bring a lot of Chaos... And Ionia tends to be the most peaceful option out of all.

Bilgewater would consist of tons of criminals, same as Zaun.

Noxus and Damacia are equally as bad because of their ideals.

A lot of people would struggle to adjust to Piltovers high standards.

Shurima is a bit of a mixed case because of the battle for control between Xerath and Azir.

Bandle City I just can't see it happen.

Freljord is a mixed case because there are certain Characters (Lissandra as an example) who would bring Chaos with such an event.

Ixtal, I don't know too much about this Region but if it meant that we'd potentially have someone like Qiyana in charge then without any doubt would it be because she would bring slavery with her.

replies.body:
anything but ionia.
i realized pretty much every champ i hate comes from there.

Shurima because I love that region.
Clearly not Ionia because it's boring asf with the whole pacifist thing going on.
never underestimate the little guys and gals. they'll take the place over without you realizing.
Tokogol will gain world dominance, because it just makes sense...

Noxus, actually. They’re the only country, except maybe Shurima under Azir or Xerath, that will actually be able to keep their control over the world. And with Swain in charge, we’ll be able to fight off potential threats to the world easily united.

The world under Noxus, once they control all of it, will probably actually be relatively peaceful, ignoring the Reckoning arenas and such.

I would say Piltover/Zaun because it's look like our modern world so i feel like the "technology" is the future. No matter which civilization will win, the technology will always win. Even if Piltover don't win the war, their techs will be used by others regions. 

The only case where it's wouldn't happend would be if Bandle city took control of the world because they are creatures living in the forest. Obviously, they don't like technology because it's destroying nature. 

Demacia is afraid of magic but, i don't think J4 would prevent Piltover from using techs. After all, Piltover isn't really an enemy of Demacia, and J4 is more open-minded and i think he would allow it. Ofc now he is a little bit against mages but i'm sure Shyvana will do something and cure his anger. 
+ technology isn't really magic, even if they use hextech, does Demacians see hextech as magic? I'm sure Piltovians could say "it's not magic, it's hextech" and Demacian people would not see it because they are so misinformed on magic. They know what magic is but they don't know what hextech is. 

But Noxus would use them to develop their society. 

Frejlord would be interested in some techs because they are living in a hard region (cold, savage and everything). 

Azir or Xerath are power hungry and if Shurima took the world, they would use Piltover techs. 

Ixtal with Qiyana, even if she don't like Piltovians, i'm sure she could find a way to use their techs for something. After all, when you discover comfort, you don't want to destroy it right? When she will learn about robots servants who can serve her at full energy, or when she will heard about social medias, i think she may change her mind on Piltovians and use their techs but turning them into slaves. 


The shadow isles, i don't know because i don't really know the purpose of Mordekaiser. Does he want to control the world or kill the world? I think he would still use Piltover tech. 

Bilgewater is full of pirates and i'm sure they are 100% interested in techs, especially when it's can give them power and money. 


Ionia is peaceful like you said and Piltover won't have any problem to develop and expand their techs.
I don't believe technology will rule since magic literally exists.

Yes. On gifted indivuduals.

Meanwhile hextech is technology that is literally able to harness magic so every ordinary person who got trained to use the device is able to use this magic. Meaning that it enables even people without natural gift in magic to use magic.

Sounds like a big advantage if you ask me.

Zaun.
You can join a robot cult and do things like:
Loot from abandon labs
Steal from current labs
Be a robot
Look at green things
Hangout with Zac
Buy drugs from Singed
Beat up Ekkos gang of orphans
Ride really big elevators
Take so many drugs you get green vains, go bald and turn pale.
Shoot green goop guns at Ekkos gang of orphans.
Hangout with Mundo.
Test drugs on people just for fun.
Test drugs on yourself for fun.
Eat cheese with Twitch.
Eat cheese with Twitch in front of Ekkos gang of orphans

I really could go on because Zaun life would be great.

I will say that Bandle City would bring the biggest amount of Chaos.

Why? Because Bandle City is "a place of unfettered magic, where the foolhardy can be led astray by myriad wonders, and end up lost in a dream...
In Bandle City, it is said that every sensation is heightened for non-yordles. Colors are brighter. Food and drink intoxicates the senses for years and, once tasted, will never be forgotten. The sunlight is eternally golden, the waters crystal clear, and every harvest brings a fruitful bounty. Perhaps some of these claims are true, or maybe none—for no two taletellers ever seem to agree on what they actually saw.

Only one thing is known for certain, and that is the timeless quality of Bandle City and its inhabitants."

If it Ruled over Runeterra, the whole **REALITY** would change and people would go INSANE... And that is for everyone, even undeads and void creatures would be confused of the weirdness of Bandle. Is that Flower talking to you? yep, that is normal now, you can literally taste the rainbow now... and you will NEVER forget the flavour. Is that person REALLY a human or just a yordle in disguise? No one knows. What time is it? there is no time. Its this just a dream? No, its reality now.
Demacia but without J4 as a leader.

Well imo Ionia, despite being geographically a sort of Australia seems more like Asia to me, somewhat of a Japan maybe. Demacia is Sparta/ Greece. Noxus is Rome. Shurima is Egypt, Targon is somewhat like Israel or whatnot, Frejlord are just local tribes in the Antarctica lol. The others seem to be more localized so to speak, like Zaun is Honk Kong etc.But yeah imo, Noxus is clearly expanding, Demacia is firmly holding it's ground, Ionia isn't really used to war but now that they had no choice and they had a taste, if you imagine Irelia as a leader they could play that game just fine I guess but they're about counter attack at that point, it's like Russia vs US, if the fight comes to them they can match them but if they have to take the initiative they sorta land locked and aren't going anywhere or not land locked but still same shiz rly. Idk, the thing is I don't really want to choose, I just wanna see them go at it and have everything unfold lol.
Bandle City cause that would be hilarious.
